PHRASE.LANG: Vathek el demonio de las sombras

Born in a shadowy underworld, Vathek has become trapped in PlayStation®Home by mysterious magical means. This makes him very angry, very angry indeed, and he shows it! Ideal for your most demonic friend. [#Legal]

Né dans un monde plongé dans l'ombre, Vathek est piégé dans PlayStation®Home par de mystérieux sorts magiques. Cela le rend très énervé, très très énervé, et il le montre ! Idéal pour la plupart de vos amis démoniaques. [#Legal]

Vathek wurde in der finsteren Unterwelt geboren und ist durch Magie in PlayStation®Home gefangen. Das macht ihn sehr, sehr wütend und daraus macht er auch kein Geheimnis! Perfekt für deine bösesten Freunde. [#Legal]

Nato negli Inferi ombrosi, Vathek è rimasto intrappolato in PlayStation®Home a causa di misteriosi poteri magici. È molto arrabbiato per questo, ma davvero molto e non ne fa mistero! Ideale per il tuo amico più demoniaco. [#Legal]

Nacido en un inframundo de sombras, unos misteriosos medios mágicos han atrapado a Vathek en PlayStation®Home. ¡Esto no le gusta nada, nada de nada, y lo demuestra! Ideal para tu amigo más demoníaco. [#Legal]
어두침침한 지하세계에서 태어난 바섹은 미스테리하고 마술적인 힘에 의해 PlayStation®Home에 갇혀 버렸지요. 그것 때문에 그는 분노했고, 자신의 분노를 표출하곤 합니다! 당신의 가장 마귀 같은 친구로 딱입니다. [#Legal]

Born in a shadowy underworld, Vathek has become trapped in PlayStation®Home by mysterious magical means. This makes him very angry, very angry indeed, and he shows it! Ideal for your most demonic friend. [#Legal]
Vathek生於黑暗的地下冥界，被神秘的法術困在PlayStation®Home，所以他非常非常憤怒，而且他要發洩！適合愛搞鬼神那一套的朋友。 [#Legal]
